original_title: Sarau da Onça - A Poesia de Quebrada
overview: "Poetry is the divisor, before it repression, after her freedom", thus recites the poet evanilson alves, "sarau of the jaguar - poetry of broken" documents the poetic sarau that happens every fortnight in sussuarana, periphery of Salvador. On stage birth abdias, women and men in poetry saw ounces in the jungle of the Bahia capital.
title: Sarau da Onça - A Poesia de Quebrada
